Episode Summary: Episode # 7693 ~ Quinn makes a plan to find Wyatt a date, unaware that he's seeing Kate; Brooke gives Ridge a bit of insight into why she left Bill.
Recap: Brooke runs into Ridge at Forrester's and says she just could not go home now. He says she brought out the best in Bill but even that was not good enough so he understands. RJ walks in and says looks like something has changed. Brooke says she does not know what the future will be but she is not going back home to Bill. Ridge says they were just now discussing it so they will tell RJ more later. RJ says he will leave them alone for now so they can get back to their discussion. Brooke leans her head on Ridge's shoulder. He tells her it is like old times when they were younger and he is going to hang on to those words "not yet". He says he has made promises he could not keep and he is not going to ask her to do that. Slowly she tells him about Bill knocking his own son to the ground but she is not ready to tell him why. He says he knows he has hurt her in the past and he is sorry. He wants to make up for that.

Eric needs another electrical outlet. Mateo even offers to do it himself; another one of his talents. Eric says he does enough so that is not necessary; just call an electrician. He tells Quinn that she better keep Mateo happy as he is a man of many talents. Then she switches over to Wyatt and perhaps fixing him up with Charlotte at the office. She seems to perk up when Wyatt is around. Eric chides her for being the ultimate matchmaker. Wyatt talks Katie into taking the day off at work and just working at home. Mateo lets slip to Quinn that he saw her son at Katie's this morning and he's been there a couple of hours. She's curious. There is a knock at Katie's door but no answer. Quinn walks on in calling out Katie and Wyatt's name. She thinks she must be wrong until she hears a big thump upstairs and calls out if everything is all right. She walks on into the bedroom and Katie shrieks; Wyatt dives under the covers. Quinn demands to know who that is and finally Wyatt pokes his head out. Quinn screams NO!
Transcript: Brooke: I don't know why i came here.
Ridge: It's okay if you don'T.
Brooke: I just didn't want to go home.
Ridge: I understand that.
Brooke: There's so much good in him that other people don't get to see.
Ridge: Well, I think you bring out the best in him, but... the way you treat him and the way he treats you, that's not a measure of his character.
Brooke: I know. That's why I can't go back.
Katie: Where did you get these grapes? They are delicious.
Wyatt: [ Laughs ] Uh, it's harvest time, isn't it?
Katie: Oh, right, well, that must mean you got it from that food truck where you bought the salmon burgers.
Wyatt: Yeah. Yeah. Look, stick with me, kid. I will show you all the good takeout places in L.A. That are near a freeway exit.
Katie: [ Chuckles ] Well, uh, this has been lovely, but I got to get back to work.
Wyatt: What? No, you don'T.
Katie: Oh, but I do.
Wyatt: No.
Katie: Are you gonna get all caveman on me and start telling me what to do?
Wyatt: I would never do that.
Katie: Where are you going?
Wyatt: Oh, I was just gonna open the slider, get some fresh air.
Katie: Oh, no, no, no, no. Don't do that.
Wyatt: Why?
Katie: Well, uh, because I -- I know for a fact that you can see eric's house from there, which means quinn might see you.
Wyatt: Right. I know that. You don't really have to go to work right now, do you?
Katie: Wyatt spencer, are you blackmailing me?
Wyatt: No. What? No! I am not.
Eric: I can't tell if it's the wiring or if it's the actual switch that need to be repaired. Now, could you get an electrician in here?
Mateo: Sure, the three-way switch at the top of the stairs?
Eric: Yes, that's right.
Mateo: I'll take a look at it myself.
Eric: No, you have enough to do around the estate, all right?
Mateo: No, no, it's no problem. I'm pretty well-versed in circuitry.
Eric: Yeah?
Quinn: Of course you are. I mean, we're in awe of your ability to fix pretty much anything.
Mateo: Then your back is better, I hope?
Quinn: Right now, it is almost perfect.
Eric: Yes. Thank you for taking such good care of my wife.
Eric: Some people are born with a good sense of direction, and other people are born with a sense of how things work. We got to keep this young man happy!
Quinn: How will we know that he is?
Eric: He's not overtly open, is he?
Quinn: Well, that's a blessing with some people.
Eric: We'll get to know more about him. That'll come with time.
Quinn: Well, here's what i know so far. He spoke a little bit about his family. We know that he's eco-conscious, and he told me he broke up with his girlfriend, so he's single.
Eric: Young single men have limited topics of conversation.
Quinn: Uh, not you when we first got together.
Eric: Well, I was born fascinating.

Quinn: [ Giggles ] You were. You share that with my son, you know. Although, ever since he's been single, he's -- he's a good listener, but he's not really very talkative. I really wish he would find someone.
Katie: Yeah, I, um... I think I'm gonna work from home today. Thanks, pam. Bye.
Katie: Okay. You happy?
Wyatt: Mm-hmm.
Katie: We have some time.
Wyatt: Oh. I like time. I just hope that it's not borrowed time, considering eric now knows about us.
Katie: No, I -- he's not gonna say anything to quinn. I mean, we asked him not to, and he's pretty good at keeping other people's secrets.
Wyatt: But still, I mean, don't you think we should be prepared? I mean, like, what if, I don't know, brooke all of a sudden wanted to join the party and walk in here.
Katie: Uh, I don't see that happening. I -- I saw her today, and she has the weight of the world on her shoulders.
Wyatt: Look, I don't think she's gonna dump dad even if he deserves it because he is nothing if not tenacious.
Katie: Yeah, well, I guess I've just seen it too many times. It seems like the men in her life end up being a footnote to the story of brooke and ridge.
Ridge: You want me to take you home?
Brooke: That's all right. I have my car.
Ridge: Just to run interference, I mean.
[ Door opens ]
R.J.: Hey. Sorry to interrupt.
Brooke: No, you're not.
R.J.: Looks like something's changed.
Ridge: Your mother has something to discuss with you, but not right now.
R.J.: What, you're not going back to bill spencer's house, are you? Or are you? Mom, I'm sorry. I --
Brooke: No, it's okay. It's just... I don't know what the future holds, but I had to end my marriage with bill.
Eric: Not a bad quarter, actually.
Quinn: How about that really pretty blonde girl? What's her name?
Eric: Who?
Quinn: Charlotte!
Eric: Charlotte who?
Quinn: Charlotte! Charlotte. From -- from the office. Is she as nice as she seems?
Eric: Oh, well, I haven't said more to her than "good morning" or "good night." Why -- why do you bring her up?
Quinn: I don't know, she just -- she always seems to -- she always seems to perk up a little bit when wyatt stops by the office.
Eric: Yeah, no surprise there. I think ridge has actually had to speak to her about office romances.
Quinn: But that wouldn't even be an issue because wyatt doesn't work at forrester anymore. I mean, maybe we should encourage her.
Eric: Does parental matchmaking ever work out?
Quinn: Oh, come on. Wyatt isn't even dating anyone. I mean, it's not good for a young man like that to make his whole life about work.
Eric: Well, he probably has other interests that he just keeps to himself.
Quinn: Yeah. I don't know, maybe they're athletic.
Wyatt: So, what are we gonna do with this windfall day we didn't even plan on having?
Katie: I don't know. Gin rummy?
Wyatt: That's funny. That's funny.
Katie: [ Giggles ]
Wyatt: We can continue talking about your sister, 'cause I know how that gets you in the mood.
Katie: Oh, yeah. Yeah. That's hot.
Wyatt: [ Laughing ] Yeah.
Katie: Actually, I just -- i really do want her to be happy.
Wyatt: I know. I do. You know, all this talk about destiny is getting me kinda... mm.
Katie: Yeah? Really?
Wyatt: Mm-hmm. Yeah. I think you were onto something with this game idea. Do you know of any physical non-talking games we could play upstairs?
Katie: Hmm, let me think.
Wyatt: Mm.
Katie: Yeah, 3 or 4.
Wyatt: [ Gasps ] 3 or 4?
R.J.: Did something happen, mom?
Ridge: It's not the time, son.
Brooke: I had to make a decision, and I did.
R.J.: I tried to like him, mom. I did. I know he made you happy, and he was fun to be around, but to me, he was always like an alien trying to impersonate a human.
Brooke: [ Scoffs ]

Ridge: All right, I think your mom is aware that we're not bill spencer fans. That doesn't really matter right now. You fall in love with someone, there isn't a list of requirements or a test that you take. It'S... you just take someone at face value. And then sometimes you don't see it coming when they fail you. When that does happen, you wonder why you ever trusted them in the first place. I've failed your mom many times. And I take no pleasure in seeing her going through that again. I once heard bill say that getting even is the thing he's best at.
Ridge: All right, let's change the subject.
R.J.: I'm just saying, i think she would be safer with us.
Brooke: Honey, I'm all right. I'm just feeling quiet. Some things make you feel better to talk about, and some things not so much.
R.J.: I don't even remember what pam sent me in here for. You know, I'll just tell her that you guys are in a top-secret meeting.
Ridge: That's a good idea.
R.J.: Okay. Yeah. You guys just, uh, stay like this.
Ridge: That is quite a kid you raised with minimal help from me.
Brooke: My proudest accomplishment.
Ridge: He's here for you. 'Cause he loves you. We all love you.

Ridge: You know when friends don't see each other for a while, and then they pick up right where they left off? That's what we are. You know, we're here sitting together, and... you can just lean on me. Brings me back to when we were young and strong and in love, and nothing was ever gonna change.
Brooke: Ridge.
Ridge: I'm -- mnh-mnh. I'm not -- I'm not saying that you're leaning on me that way.
Brooke: I can'T.
Ridge: I -- I'm gonna choose to hear that you said "not yet." I know bill's not gonna let you go without a fight, I know that.
Brooke: There's not gonna be a fight.
Ridge: What happened?
Brooke: [ Sighs ]
Ridge: That bad, huh?
Brooke: I just have to get clear about what I can live with.
Ridge: But it was worse than being thrown out of a helicopter? Because you found a way to live with that.
Brooke: He told me he'd changed, and I believed him.

Ridge: And, you know what, i think he believed it when he said it. 'Cause if you're faced with the possibility of losing the one thing that means more than anything else to you... you make promises you can't keep. I've done it.
Brooke: Me, too.
Ridge: I've got to ask you, though. Did he ever raise a hand to you?
Brooke: No. Never.
Ridge: Well, there's violence in that man. I had to ask.
Brooke: Well... he did hit liam hard enough to knock him to the ground.
Ridge: Wow. His own son. I guess I shouldn't be surprised. That's spencer. What set him off?
Brooke: You know, I'm not really ready to talk about it.
Ridge: And I'm not really asking anything.
Brooke: Okay.
Ridge: I just want to let you know I'm here. So you can lean on me.
Mateo: Oh! Hey, let me do that for you.
Quinn: What? Oh, it's not heavy. [ Laughs ]
Mateo: Well, you were twisting. That's the worst thing you can do when your erector spinae is acting up.
Quinn: Oh, I'm assuming you're talking about back muscles.
Mateo: Plants and muscles don't respond to their latin names, so...
Quinn: [ Sighs ] Well, do we have a working switch yet?
Mateo: Not yet. The box is all black on the inside. It needs an upgrade. I think there must have been a short at some point.
Quinn: Well, that doesn't sound good.

Mateo: Yeah, you could have had a fire. Well, I'll have it replaced, and I'll check the others while I'm at it, okay? Oh, uh, hey, would you mind telling your son mr. Spencer and your husband to stay away from it until I get back?
Quinn: My husband and...
Mateo: Mr. Spencer, your son.
Quinn: Oh! Oh! Yeah. Wyatt! He used to live here, but he doesn't anymore.
Mateo: Well, I saw him visiting. Maybe he's still next door.
Quinn: Next door? Why would you say that?
Mateo: I saw him driving through the neighbor's gate.
Quinn: Katie logan's?
Mateo: Well, his car's kind of hard to miss. I just assumed that he'd come by here later.
Quinn: Oh, well, maybe he's dropping off a present for will. How long ago was that?
Mateo: Couple hours?
Quinn: Couple of hours?
Wyatt: Mmm, mmm, mmm.
Katie: Are you in a hurry?
Wyatt: No, no, no. Yes. Yes, actually, I am. Yeah.
Katie: Mmm.
Ridge: You okay?
Brooke: Yeah. Might as well be.
Ridge: That's not an answer.
Brooke: [ Scoffs ] It's all I've got.
Ridge: We got to keep an eye on R.J. He has high hopes. You know how he gets.
Brooke: Yeah, I do.
Ridge: And you know how i get.
Brooke: I do.
Ridge: What does that mean?
Brooke: When we're not together, you want to be. And when we are, you're not sure.
Ridge: Ouch.
Brooke: I didn't say that to be mean.
Ridge: I know that. But, you know, people can change, and maybe you want to give me a second chance. 22nd chance. I don't know what the number is.
Brooke: Ridge...
Ridge: I'm just happy that there's even a small possibility that I could have logan back in my life.
Brooke: People think we've grown apart.
Ridge: What? People don't know anything. We haven't grown apart. Can we at least agree on that?
Brooke: Yeah. Even when...
Ridge: Even when what?

Brooke: When you lived overseas and we would talk by phone about your dad and about the kids... I'd wake up in the middle of the night and I'd feel like you were in the house. I'd get up and I'd put my robe on and I'd go check every room, behind every door. Because it just seemed like you there to surprise me. You know how much you loved to surprise me.
Ridge: It's true.
Brooke: But the surprise was that you were still gone.
Ridge: I've hurt you so much. I'm sorry. Someone like you, as rare and special as you, you shouldn't even know what heartache feels like. I would like to make it up to you. If you'll let me.
Eric: Quinn, I want to ask you -- quinn?
[ Door opens ]
Mateo: [ Exhales sharply ]
Eric: Mateo, have -- have you seen mrs. Forrester?
Mateo: I think she might be next door.
Eric: Well, that's not likely.
Mateo: At ms. Logan'S.
Eric: The two of them don't really get along.
Mateo: Well, her son is there, or he was, so it should be fine.
Katie: [ Giggles ]
Wyatt: Mm. Oh! Are you secretly an underwear model?
Katie: [ Giggles ] Really? That's the line you're going with?
Wyatt: Yeah.
Katie: Oh, wow.
Wyatt: Did it work?
Katie: Yeah, it's working.
Wyatt: [ Laughing ] Yeah.
Katie: [ Giggles ]
[ Knocks on door ]
Quinn: Katie? The door was unlocked! Is everything okay? [ Sighs ] Wyatt? You're not here. [ Scoffs ] Mateo must have been wrong.
[ Thumping ]
Quinn: Katie? Is everything all right?
Quinn: Katie?
Katie: [ Screams ]
Quinn: Everything okay?
Katie: Oh, my god! Quinn! What are you doing here?
Quinn: Who's there?
Katie: Just me.
Quinn: No, I -- I'm not talking to you!
Katie: Get out of my house!
Quinn: Who's in that bed with you?!
Katie: Really? Is this any of your business?
Quinn: I don't know, katie! Is it? [ Gasps ] No. No! No!!!
